comment:
* PathDataEvaluator is used to interpolate between two paths which are
     * represented in the same format but different control points' values.
     * The path is represented as verbs and points for each of the verbs.

methods.name: public PathParser.PathData evaluate(float fraction, PathParser.PathData startPathData, PathParser.PathData endPathData)

methodNames: public PathParser.PathData evaluate(float fraction, PathParser.PathData startPathData, PathParser.PathData endPathData)
